description: Character sheet queries - read-only queries from XML or Foundry character sheets

usage_documentation.purpose: Queries character sheet data from XML file. Does NOT write to episode files - read-only queries.

categories.powers: Query power data from character sheet
categories.abilities: Query ability ranks (STR, DEX, CON, INT, WIS, CHA)
categories.defenses: Query defense values (Dodge, Parry, Toughness, Fortitude, Will)

list_command.description: Returns a formatted list of all items in the specified category
list_command.returns: Numbered, formatted list of all items in the category

read_only.description: Character sheet queries are read-only - they do NOT write to episode files
read_only.note: Query results are returned to the user but not automatically written to episodes

mcp_tool.name: character_sheet_load
mcp_tool.description: Load character sheet from XML or Foundry and query data by category

name_or_index.description: Optional: specific power/skill name or index to query
